title: to (c) of that subsection as they relate to the body to which the following order
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 31) (Irish Financial Services 
Appeals Tribunal) (Designation) Order 2020. 

(2) The Irish Financial Services Appeals Tribunal is, for the purposes of 
section 31 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 
2020 (No. 13 of 2020), designated and may hold hearings before it by remote 
hearing. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

5 October, 2020. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [424] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
